arguments.body:
1. **AI breakthrough** – A new AI model achieves near‑human performance on language tasks, promising faster content creation. (https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/09/ai-nlp-breakthrough)

2. **Quantum computing** – Quantum computers are now offered as a cloud service, enabling businesses to solve complex problems. (https://www.theverge.com/2025/12/09/quantum-computing-commercial)
